name: Blackjack Casino 2 - Double Down for 21
description:
Beautiful to show your friends.

Free.

A whole new Blackjack experience.

Experience the grandeur and exquisite feel of Las Vegas as Blackjack Casino 2 comes right to your iPhone and iPod Touch.

Blackjack Casino 2 preserves classic casino gaming while offering a stunning design and seamless gameplay to the most favorite card game all over the world. Step up to the table, strategize and play against the dealer to see who can score 21 without going bust - feel the gambling thrill anytime, anywhere without real money at stake!

*** Features ***
- Authentic casino experience with true-to-life game rules and structure
- Stunning retina graphics and seamless gameplay
- Gorgeous design, beautiful to show to your friends
- Learn card counting like a professional
- Enjoy Blackjack
